content: decrease slip 2 sts as if to k one at a time slip the sts back to the lh m = marker needle knit / purl through back loop m1l / m1pl = make 1 purl left left leaning increase st s = stitch es insert left needle from front to back under the strand of yarn which runs between the next stitch on the left needle tbl = through the back loop and last stitch on the right needle knit purl this stitch yo = yarn over through the back loop m o c s tin k - k c u r ts n o o m @ o photography daan schipper fn i 4 2 technical editing yoff kauf 0 2 y b n r title quote mary webb o h a js a ta n © k n il
